trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were 2 other sightings in Houston on or around November 21st 2008
Summary: Saw fast moving "plus sign" above NW Freeway in Houston 11/21/08.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving my car to work, on the northwest freeway heading east towards downtown houston, tx on 11\21\08. at 6:45 am cst i saw something high in the sky moving very fast. at first i thought it might be some sort of a balloon but when it got closer i could see the color was a metal gray and the shape was like a three dimensional plus sign that was not revolving but appeared to be moving back and forth. it disappeared very quickly from my view. i looked around to see if any other drivers saw the same thing but didn't get that impression. i felt exhilarated and called my husband david, who was once very active in mufon, and told him what i saw. he told me not everyone sees ufos and there was a reason for me to see this one today. i've seen ghost and spirits before but this was my first ufo sighting.
